attributes.title: Straight up trash
attributes.review:
The sole purpose of me getting this app was because I heard that after u download it ur crush will appear in your room. And lookie here No Min Yoongi has showed up yet not even a knock off version which is complete bs if u ask me. What type of President wouldn’t make this possible I mean completely ridiculous. If Obama was still president this type of foolishness wouldn’t be tolerated. Periodt Pooh! All I’m saying is this orange guy isnt even capable of bringing us are basic needs how can he make America great again. Say it with me people min yoongi, min yoongi... also let’s still try to save Barron trump because that is bae.
Gen z rules!!!!!!!!

attributes.title: remove trump as president 🤮
attributes.review: first off I wanted to say that the fact that trump had the audacity to mock George Floyd’s death is despicable , second trump supporters need to open their eyes and see what their “president” is doing to everyone . if ur a decent human being u should know  that all problems trump is causing are wrong . I’m sorry but trump isn't my present Obama is , and it’s really a shame that we have a president that continues to let these things happen . I just want to say that trump encourages the fact that men earn more money then women . Men have more of a possibility to get the job then women . it’s not fair,make America great again please ( not trump)

attributes.title: 🥕Everything turned orange 🥕
attributes.review: So I got this app hoping that my inner American would come out but sadly it Didn’t. Instead a virus took over my phone and made everything orange which I thought was strange and to top that the Oompa Loompas from Willy wonka interrupt my face time calls🙄 and sing that Oompa Loompa song with our wonderful president. I didn’t even know they where that close but I can see where our wonderful president get his great sense of fashion💅. With all the many terrible problem In the world right now our president made the wise choice to worry about a awful app called tik tok and not the “fakes news”. What a president 😌

attributes.title: BROKE MY IPHONE
attributes.review: This app deleted my deleted my bank account. This app then made it so I couldn’t call people. Every time I did it would say “ Trump is the best, and your a stupid person if you think other wise.” This was so sad. My phone would glitch. Also bad quality. When I would sleep at night I would see Trump staring at me on my phone. I was fed up with this app. I couldn’t delete it, so I put it on my nightstand. I then went on a walk. My phone then exploded the whole house! The only thing that was safe was the MAGA hat. Didn’t have a scratch. This all happened because of this app. Rate this app 1 Star if you agree.

attributes.title: Worst app ever
attributes.review: Some of these reviews are fake, this is not one of them. This app took 2 hours to download! Then once I finally got it on my phone I couldn’t open it for a full 24 hours. It was terrifying. Then I finally opened it and i was pretty excited to see what was on there but then my phone just shut off!!! I tried plugging it in but it wasn’t out of power. 3 days later I was able to reopen my phone only to see that it had some sort of virus and a lot of my information was stolen! This app is horrible and I can’t stand it. I had to replace all my cards and my phone. Do not get this!!!!

attributes.title: ✨worst app ever✨
attributes.review:
I downloaded this app to support my racist, homophobic, xenophobic, misogynistic, orange🍊 president and I’m appalled. The app took weeks to download and as soon as I did weird things started happening around my house. I started seeing this person with a horrible orange fake tan walking around my house yelling “trump 2020” but then would turn the corner and disappear. As soon as you open the app it’s starts to yell profanities at you and uses 5G data to control your mind. I went to sleep one night and the next morning found myself floating on a mattress in the middle of the ocean. I have no choice but to blame the app. DO NOT DOWNLOAD!!!🧚‍♀️✨💕💅
Anyways... ACAB❤️

attributes.title: This App Made Me A 🤢🤢Liberal🤢🤢
attributes.review: It’s unclear how this happened, but I suspect it had something to do with its connection to 5G networks. I downloaded the app before going to bed and when I woke up, I suddenly started agreeing with human rights!! DO NOT download this app, or I fear the same thing might happen to you!! 😡🤢 It gets in through ~satellite channels~ and infects your brain!! Now whenever I think about Jesus my mind automatically pulls up a mental image of Bernie Sanders?? This is very strange, I plan on going to see a specialist later today- and I will be wearing a mask to the appointment 🤢😥 I’ve lost all my mental freedom to this app please I beg you don’t download it!!

attributes.title: no ❤️
attributes.review:
Don’t download this app. The first time I opened it a very ugly, ✨orange✨, old guy was asking for my PERSONAL information. Then the whole app 💖hacked💖 my bank account. Every day it charged me without my permission. Sounds 🧚🏼‍♀️lovely🧚🏼‍♀️, doesn’t it? Well that’s only the start. The second time I opened the app the ugly, ✨orange✨, old guy started telling me sexist, racist, and homophobic things. I don’t want my stuffed animals to hear that kind of stuff because they are beautiful and kind. I’m going back to getting my information from the app our 
🍯president🍯 is trying to ban for some weird reason. He’s just pressed bc we ruined his rally.

attributes.title: ✨he stinky ✨
attributes.review: it’s really bothering me and my homegirls how he’s a rapist, allied w our enemies, wants to deport international students, he has poor leadership skills, he’s very narcissistic, only caters to himself and white heterosexual rich men, had connection with Epstein, does nothing for sexual assault in this country but claims we should “grab them by the pu**y”, doesn’t think women should have equal pay, has over 100,000 people dying for corona but suggest we shouldn’t test so numbers and statistics grow, threaten to cut school funds if we don’t open back up but deaths are still rising. have children in cages and allowing them to get assaulted. 🤢🤢🤢🤢 i don’t like him.

attributes.title: Very bad no good
attributes.review: I’m gonna cry omg omg I wanna is the way that you look at us and then I have to ask y’all to make it a good thing to do it and I think it’s about the people who don’t think they were just talking about it omg is the day that we can get together to get it done with ya know lol lol yeah yeah that’s fine I’ll talk about to you later I’ll see if y’all can get it done before you leave I can pick ya guys up on my lunch break and then sit down for lunch and I can get my mom and I will be here at all three times again tonight I don’t know how to make you feel like you have to go to church and then sit down with me haha is that good
